T = int(input())
while T > 0:
    (a, b, c, d, K) = map(int, input().split())
    diff_x = a - c
    diff_y = b - d
    r1 = abs(diff_x) + abs(diff_y)
    r2 = K - r1
    if r2 % 2 == 0 and r2 >= 0:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')
    T -= 1

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    M = input()
    L = M.split()
    K = int(L[-1])
    (a, b) = (int(L[0]), int(L[1]))
    (c, d) = (int(L[2]), int(L[3]))
    diff1 = abs(a - c)
    diff2 = abs(b - d)
    l = diff1 + diff2
    if K >= l and (K - l) % 2 == 0:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')
